subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba scored both goals in Chelsea’s 2-0 victory over Wolves, opening a four-point lead in the Premier League after Manchester United lost, 3-1, at Everton.
snippet: Didier Drogba scored both goals in Chelsea’s 2-0 victory over Wolves, opening a four-point lead in the Premier League after Manchester United lost, 3-1, at Everton.
